channel.title: My server is a bit laggy
channel.description: when i run my server it is a bit laggy-not sure what to do. im wondering if i end some processes in my task manager?

@doom_j wrote:

it might be the sources you picked suck ass

item.title: My server is a bit laggy
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

try using disk cleanup and disk defragement. Simple things that clear out temp files and unused files that are taking up CPU for no reason.

Read full topic
item.source: My server is a bit laggy

item.title: My server is a bit laggy
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Your server being laggy can be for the following reasons:

A: Your Computer is unable to withstand the Server being online due to it being old, or just slow.

B: Your Internet connection isn’t very strong for allowing other’s to connect with you.

C: Opened Programs will cause the Server to have a hard time allowing other’s to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: My server is a bit laggy
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

I suggest restarting your computer completely, cleaning out some of the processes you have running

Maybe clearing out the process() in your server, and you should do fine until around… 30-50 players, then you might want to look into investing in a VPS.

~Hope i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: My server is a bit laggy
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Your best bet is going to be find a new hoster (someone you trust… or just someone that offers to do it)

Or buy a VPS (http://www.vpsland.com has cheap ones)

Some computers just aren’t meant to hold that amount of players.

POST YOUR SPECS FOR ME PLEASE.
Memory + Processor speed

Read full topic

item.title: My server is a bit laggy
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Taht could be it.

Also could be because your servers process() is too large.

Also could be your Hosting computers Upload Speed
I reccomend testing it at http://speedtest.net

If its slow, you might want to have someone else host your server.
